item.description:
Let's run on the Carriage Roads along Comm Ave (the Marathon Route).

Is 8:30am better? Let me know either way.

We'll meet at the Auburndale Plaza on Comm Ave in the StarMarket parking lot. There is also Brueggers Bagels (we can even go for bagels after the run if anyone is interested).

You can park in the parking lot or you can park on the carriage road across the Plaza.
We'll run up toward BC. It could be anywhere from 4 miles to 10 miles depending on how we all feel. We'll go at easy pace, start with 9-10min/mile and see how it goes.
item.name: Saturday Morning Run
